title: Learning to use your senses
creator_credit: Arthur R. Botham and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Explains the functions of the five senses - sight, hearing, touch, smell and taste - and shows how to recognise situations relevant to each of the five senses in the context of a birthday party.
creator_credit_for_label: Arthur R. Botham and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
